content.text: I'm a volunteer with my son's Boy Scout troop.
That's awesome! I'm single, but my friends are like family to me.
I grow the tallest sunflowers you've ever seen.
That's incredible! I won the spelling bee in third grade.
I haven't had to work a day in my life.
I'm an avid cook and weight lifter.
I love listening to chillstep while I do yoga in the morning.
I have a master's degree in Italian literature.
I would like to be reincarnated as someone who is loved by their family and is successful in their career.
That's a great goal! I hope you achieve it!
